mapper.insert: insert into employee_families (employee_no, name, relations, cohabitation, dependents, handicapped, family_no) values (#{employeeNo}, #{name}, #{relations}, #{cohabitation}, #{dependents}, #{handicapped}, families_seq.nextval)
mapper.select: select employee_no as employeeNo, name as name, relations as relations, cohabitation as cohabitation, dependents as dependents, handicapped as handicapped, family_no as familyNo from employee_families
